org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging
Class AeTeeDeploymentLogger

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging.AeTeeDeploymentLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeBaseErrorReporter, IAeDeploymentLogger
public class AeTeeDeploymentLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeDeploymentLogger

T's the output of the log to two separate loggers.
